alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 07 at 5:21PM EDT until October 08 at 12:55PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 17.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Sat 4 pm: 14.6 Forecast: Sat 8 pm 16.5 Sun 2 am 17.9 Sun 8 am 16.8 Sun 2 pm 16.0 Sun 8 pm 15.2 Mon 2 am 14.5 Mon 8 am 14.0 Mon 2 pm 13.6 Mon 8 pm 13.3 Tue 2 am 13.0 Tue 8 am 12.9 Tue 2 pm 12.7 &&
